ing: 1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
1 (9 inch) prepared chocolate cookie crumb crust
n: Smooth and Creamy Peanut Butter Pie
des: "This pie is so smooth and creamy that it will melt in your mouth!  It's always requested by my family members for its ultimate peanut butter flavor."
ins:
In a large bowl, mix together peanut butter, cream cheese and sugar. Then stir whipped topping into peanut butter mixture. Whisk until smooth and no lumps remain.
Pour filling into pie crust and refrigerate for about 3 hours until pie is firm.
